name: DesiMartini.com
tag_list: make-new-friends, chat, love-calculator, play-games, celebrity-photos, cool-videos, entertainment, social, lifestyle, celebrity-columns, celebrity-blogs, page-3-parties
overview:
A platform to discover and express oneself on movies, Desimartini.com invites viewers to simply talk movies! From providing information on storyline, star cast, trailers, photos to aiding interactions around movies in the form of reviews, ratings, polls, discussions and more, Desimartini.com aims to become a destination portal for all movie lovers.

Covering all the latest and upcoming Bollywood, Hollywood and regional movies, Desimartini.com gets thousands of ratings every week by the audiences from all over the country. Furthermore, Desimartini is extending its offering across various platforms - an already sizeable and growing presence on Facebook (Desimartini Movies with more than 1 lakh â€˜likesâ€™), a Facebook Application (Movie Talk), a weekly update SMS service (SUB to 542420) and a Mobile App for iPhones, Android and other mobile platforms.

By becoming a repository of the audiencesâ€™ views on movies, Desimartini.com aims to be the peopleâ€™s voice on cinema - Public ka Box Office!
